title: Reduced complexity
description: CDAP lowers barrier to entry to complex technologies. It increases developer productivity through focus on business logic; and leads to accelerated ROI

title: Increased velocity
description: CDAP platform and intuitive UI allow, rapid onboarding and faster time to production. It provides business value, by reducing repetition and silos, and promoting reuse and self service: build once, run anywhere

title: Increased flexibility
description: CDAP is 100% open source, portable and extensible. It integrates with latest Big Data and Cloud technologies.

title: Improved visibility
description: CDAP gives greater visibility on your data, by allowing to search metadata, and providing insight into data lineage.
